title: Game Scoop Advance
description: This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing the major advancements of this console generation, a "new" Fire Emblem, British retro gaming, and more. This episode features music from Castlevania IV, and the outro track is called "The Returned."
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing the major advancements of this console generation, a "new" Fire Emblem, British retro gaming, and more. This episode features music from Castlevania IV, and the outro track is called "The Returned."
